text: Hello it’s Flo, right now and I’m in my second year of animation and enjoying the 2d animation side

Hi Flo! I’m Kajsa. Very nice to virtually meet you here. :slightly_smiling_face: I’m looking forward to be your E-Mentor.
A bit about me; I am a digital compositor and prep artist based in London.
During the last 4 years I have worked in some great places like MPC, Double Negative and One of Us. I had the opportunity to work on many exciting projects.
Some of my favourite movies I have worked on are ‘LIFE’, ‘Wonder Woman’, ‘The Martian’ and ‘The Crown’.

I am looking forward to answer any questions you might have, big or small.
If you like feedback on any work you've done I am also happy to have a look at it. Just let me know.

Chat to you soon! :slightly_smiling_face:
